channel.title: Home on Mold Inspection 247
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Mold Inspection 247

item.title: About
item.description: Certified Mold Inspection services in Florida, led by a CIH with 25+ years experience. Expert, independent mold testing & inspections available 24/7.

item.title: Certified Mold Inspection Video
item.description: Watch our certified mold inspection video 'Fatal Fungus' to understand mold inspection processes and the importance of professional assessments.

item.title: Church Indoor Air Quality (IAQ) Services
item.description: Protect your church community with expert indoor air quality services addressing mold, dust, bacteria, and other contaminants to ensure a healthy environment.

item.title: Commercial Mold Services
item.description: Professional mold inspections and advanced indoor air quality testing for commercial properties, HOAs, and legal clients. Certified, licensed, and trusted expertise.

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: Get in touch with Mold Inspection 24/7 for expert advice, mold assessments, and support. Serving all of Florida, especially hurricane-affected areas.

item.title: Faulty Spray Foam Insulation
item.description: Discover signs of faulty spray foam insulation affecting indoor air quality and moisture in Florida homes. Get expert diagnostic inspections from Mold Inspection 24/7.

item.title: How It Works – Mold Only
item.description: Learn about our three levels of mold assessment conducted by Certified Industrial Hygienists, Licensed Mold Assessors, and Risk Managers. Understand the process and what to expect.

item.title: How to Select a Mold / IAQ Assessor
item.description: Learn how to choose a qualified mold and indoor air quality assessor. Verify licensing, certifications, and registration to ensure expert, trustworthy service.

item.title: Mold Testing
item.description: Certified Mold Testing & Evaluation Services by MoldInspection247. Independent, evidence-based mold testing aligned with Florida regulations and national best practices.

item.title: More Than Mold? Advanced Testing for Health-Sensitive Homes
item.description: Discover advanced home environmental testing beyond visible mold. Our Certified Industrial Hygienist offers ERMI, VOC screening, bacterial sampling, and more to protect your indoor air quality.

item.title: Preventing Mold
item.description: Practical advice on preventing mold growth through proper maintenance, ventilation, and timely cleanup. Certified inspection services to guide your mold prevention efforts.

item.title: Removing Mold
item.description: Guidance on when and how to remove mold safely, including professional inspection recommendations and risk assessment based on your situation.

item.title: Residential / Commercial Indoor Air Quality Test
item.description: Comprehensive indoor air quality testing for residential and commercial properties. Protect your health with certified assessments, symptom identification, and expert guidance.

item.title: Thank You
item.description:
Form Submission Success

Thank you for reaching out!

We’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

item.title: Why Choose Mold Inspection 24/7
item.description: Discover why Mold Inspection 24/7 is trusted for expert mold testing and inspections. Certified industrial hygienists, advanced diagnostics, fast turnaround, and clear reports.
